issues.projectName: IT-567 Technical Architect STA Advent Calendar - Christmas 2021
issues.description: We need some one to lead the next STA Advent Calendar.  This will be the second year of the project running with volunteers creating a challenge for each day of the calendar.  Alan Ramsay was the originator of the idea and is checking the code into Github.
